species.name: Aasimar
species.description: Aasimar bear a divine light within them, descended from celestial beings.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: You can touch a creature and restore hit points equal to your level. Once per long rest.

traits.name: Light Bearer
traits.description: You know the Light cantrip.

species.name: Dragonborn
species.description: Dragonborn are draconic humanoids with breath weapons and draconic ancestry.

subtypes.name: Black Dragon Ancestry
subtypes.description: Acid-wielding lineage, dwelling in swamps and ruins

subtypes.name: Bronze Dragon Ancestry
subtypes.description: Lightning-wielding lineage, lovers of the sea

subtypes.name: Copper Dragon Ancestry
subtypes.description: Acid-wielding lineage, known for wit and tricks

subtypes.name: Red Dragon Ancestry
subtypes.description: Fire-wielding lineage, most powerful and greedy

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type of your chosen ancestry.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale destructive energy. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + CON modifier + proficiency). Deals 2d6 damage on failed save, half on success. Damage increases at levels 5 (3d6), 11 (4d6), and 17 (5d6).

species.name: Dwarf
species.description: Dwarves are solid and enduring, known for their craftsmanship and valor.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saves against poison, resistance to poison damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: Proficiency in History checks related to the origin of stonework.

species.name: Elf
species.description: Elves are graceful people with keen senses and a deep connection to magic and nature.

subtypes.name: Drow
subtypes.description: Adapted to the Underdark with innate magic

subtypes.name: High Elf
subtypes.description: Scholarly and magical with a wizard cantrip

subtypes.name: Wood Elf
subtypes.description: Swift forest dwellers attuned to nature
subtypes.modifier: +5 ft speed, Mask of the Wild

base_traits.name: Fey Ancestry
base_traits.description: Advantage on saves against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

base_traits.name: Trance
base_traits.description: You don't sleep but meditate for 4 hours instead of sleeping for 8.

Drow.name: Drow Magic
Drow.description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Faerie Fire. At 5th level, you can cast Darkness.

Drow.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Drow.description: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in direct sunlight.

High Elf.name: Cantrip
High Elf.description: You know one cantrip from the Wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

High Elf.name: Extra Language
High Elf.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

Wood Elf.name: Fleet of Foot
Wood Elf.description: Your walking speed increases to 35 feet.

Wood Elf.name: Mask of the Wild
Wood Elf.description: You can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by foliage, rain, snow, mist, or other natural phenomena.

species.name: Gnome
species.description: Gnomes are small, inventive, and curious, with a love of tinkering and discovery.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saves against magic.

species.name: Goliath
species.description: Goliaths are massive, powerful beings native to mountain peaks and high altitudes.

traits.name: Large Form
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being pushed or knocked prone.

traits.name: Mountain Born
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage and are acclimated to high altitude.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/drag/lift.

traits.name: Stone's Endurance
traits.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d12 + your Constitution modifier. Once per long rest.

species.name: Halfling
species.description: Halflings are a cheerful and lucky people who prefer comfort and community.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: Advantage on saves against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature larger than you.

traits.name: Luck
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on d20, you can reroll and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when obscured only by a larger creature.

species.name: Human
species.description: Adaptable and ambitious, humans are the most diverse of the common species.

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: You gain Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Skillful
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain an Origin feat.

languages: One additional language of your choice

species.name: Orc
species.description: Orcs are fierce warriors with a strong sense of honor and strength.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: You can take the Dash action as a bonus action. You can use this a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/drag/lift.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead. Once per long rest.

species.name: Tiefling
species.description: Tieflings bear the mark of infernal heritage, carrying the legacy of the Lower Planes.

subtypes.name: Chthonic
subtypes.description: Connected to death and the Underworld

subtypes.name: Infernal
subtypes.description: Classic hellfire heritage from the Nine Hells

base_traits.name: Darkvision
base_traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

Abyssal.name: Abyssal Legacy
Abyssal.description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Burning Hands. At 5th level, you can cast Alter Self.

Chthonic.name: Chthonic Legacy
Chthonic.description: You know the Chill Touch cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast False Life. At 5th level, you can cast Ray of Enfeeblement.

Infernal.name: Infernal Legacy
Infernal.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Hellish Rebuke. At 5th level, you can cast Darkness.
